00029 // String conversions (all LUA functions uses always chars)
00030 // ---------------------------------------------------------
00031 
00032 #if wxUSE_UNICODE
00033         #define WX2LUA(x)               (wxString(x).mb_str(wxConvUTF8).data())
00034 #else
00035         #define WX2LUA(x)               (wxString(x).mb_str(wxConvUTF8))
00036 #endif
00037 
00038 #define LUA2WX(x)                       (wxString(x, wxConvUTF8))

00052

00067 class wxScriptFileLua : public wxScriptFile
00068 {
00069 public:
00070         wxScriptFileLua(const wxString &toload = wxEmptyString) { 
00071                 m_tScriptFile = wxLUA_SCRIPTFILE;
00072                 if (!toload.IsEmpty())
00073                         Load(toload);
00074         }
00075         virtual ~wxScriptFileLua() {}
00076 
00077         virtual bool Load(const wxString &filename);
00078 };
